menu.name: Cape Malay Chicken Curry
menu.description: Traditional mild curry with tender chicken, potatoes and fragrant spices. Served with rice and sambals.

menu.name: Boerewors Roll
menu.description: Chargrilled boerewors in a toasted bun with chakalaka relish.

menu.name: Vegetarian Bunny Chow
menu.description: Durban-style quarter loaf stuffed with spicy bean curry.

menu.name: Milk Tart Slice
menu.description: Traditional creamy custard tart with cinnamon topping.

policies.Bookings: Walk-ins welcome, but table reservations recommended on weekends.
policies.Delivery: Available via UberEats, MrD and Bolt Food
policies.Payment: We accept SnapScan, Zapper, debit/credit cards, and cash.

promotions.name: 2-for-1 Curry Thursdays
promotions.description: Order one curry, get the second free.
